website_summaries.verdict: This durable aluminum arm blaster helps you lift up to 300 lb. with great form.
cons: Consider working out in a T-shirt
straps may rub your skin if you wear a tank top

customer_reviews.title: best costumer service provide ever
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this guys just made my day they contacted me after i put the review about this arm blaster and i have to tell y’all I was speechless about how great and professional they handle this situation the replace my hand grips and went beyond that did a total refund for the item purchase “ALIN “ THANK YOU very much for taking your time and contacted me it really means a lot as a costumer than you all
customer_reviews.author: juan j

customer_reviews.title: Arm Blaster here to stay
customer_reviews.text: I heard from friends of mine technique for weight lifting and muscle building but me and my "two left arms" needed some help. So I finally decided just in time for the new years resolution to give myself a boost. Its been 3 weeks and I must say that I love this Arm Blaster. Keeps the arms in check, good craftsmanship and a new staple to my workout routine. Where has this been all my life😃.
customer_reviews.author: El Capitan

customer_reviews.title: Bodybuildrr Opinion
customer_reviews.text: I have used many copies of the blaster through out my career of bodybuilding. I must say I am most impressed with the quality of the build / construction. Fits very well with pads that feel good just when you need it for the last 2 push through reps.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Arm Blaster
customer_reviews.text: The Arm Blaster is narrow for my shoulder width (size 54 coat) and the elbows are pulled inward to the ribs when used. Others have tried it and are okay with the width. Rated five stars based on being contacted by seller prior to receiving product to ensure everything was okay and the information provided from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: C79

customer_reviews.title: Best company and product
customer_reviews.text: I was at the gym and someone took it out of my bag, I was very upset, I contacted legendary see if I could by another one at cost and they said we will just send another one for free... wow !! What a great company
customer_reviews.author: Bobby G.

customer_reviews.title: ... as well as my clients get a lot of great arm workouts
customer_reviews.text: A very secure and stable product that’s going to help myself as well as my clients get a lot of great arm workouts! I enjoy the way that the product fits my body and it allows me to get the most out of every repetition in the gym using many different exercise motions and equipment for my arms! Great equipment at a great price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great value
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I have been using old school ones at the gym for some time now with no padding. The Arm Blaster is extremely sturdy and the neck pad makes it very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ben P.

customer_reviews.title: I liked this arm blaster very much
customer_reviews.text: I liked this arm blaster very much. It have very good craftmanship, so I'm starting my training and wait for impressive result.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Rier

customer_reviews.title: And the customer services is excellent, any question you have
customer_reviews.text: Very steady and heady duty material. I luv it, and you can feel the workout all in your biceps. And the customer services is excellent, any question you have, they'll answers you within 24 hours. Very helpful and very professional. Will continue doing business with this company. I really recommend them. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Angel S.

customer_reviews.title: Blaster
customer_reviews.text: The material feels sturdy on the plate. Company has great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sore Biceps
customer_reviews.text: Used once but pretty good so far. Dropped weight a little since a can't cheat by using momentum or help from my back. Biceps pretty sore the next day, which hasn't happened in a while. Will definitely make part of arm day routine.
customer_reviews.author: Roger McNeace

customer_reviews.title: Got this because it was the most heavy duty of ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this because it was the most heavy duty of those on Amazon I could find. Others had lower weight limits and some reviews said they can bend. This one is rock solid, and will probably be around for my kids to use.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: Great for bicep workouts keeps arms steady and in place feel more of a burn
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome I like the bend in the arm blaster I ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome I like the bend in the arm blaster I get a really good contraction at the top!!! One question how do you down load the video?? I'm having trouble
customer_reviews.author: Rick albrich

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but forcing narrow curls with dumbbells.
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to see the placement for the arms to be a little wider. As it is, my curls are forced in rather than straight up and down. As far as quality goes I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s is not firm
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product, I bought this and I had some issues could not continue my training. Waited 6 months gave it a couple time try . Money in drain don’t waste your time for this find something better
customer_reviews.author: Raman shetty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality, gives me the extra pump I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of work out equipment
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of work out equipment. Well made. there is no cheating your arm work out since this blaster keeps your arms lock in place.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A.

customer_reviews.title: Needs better padding on the neck
customer_reviews.text: Needs better padding on the neck, other the that it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: kingson

customer_reviews.title: Arm blaster
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my cousins, they are always lifting weights and I thought it would be a great gift. They said this works really well to help tone there arms!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Stockman

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the customer service... Probably didn't suit my body or technique was wrong but the seller was gracious enough to help out.
customer_reviews.author: Hemant G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s works good teach u how to keep ur arm correct
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Product is OK. You don't need it. Just save your money and just do curls without it.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great isolation on the biceps. Look forward to using the Blaster in my arm routines.
customer_reviews.author: Cackster

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and really help my bicep work out
customer_reviews.text: This product was everything it said it would be. Great quality and really help my bicep work out. I feel it not only improves my form but also helps me from injuring myself. I am already seeing results.
customer_reviews.author: Robb Thorn

customer_reviews.title: They made it easy and stress free to work with
customer_reviews.text: Legendary workout resolved my issue and was able to fix my original issue. They made it easy and stress free to work with.
customer_reviews.author: NRC

customer_reviews.title: Love the arm blaster!
customer_reviews.text: I just have to say that I love this arm blaster, I used it today and I really feel my biceps burning and you guys know that every bodybuilder loves that burning feeling, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: JARED GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this arm blaster!!! I’m 6’2” and 225lbs and it fit across my chest just fine. It’s wide enough for good arm support. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Legendary Arm Blaster works exactly as it was designed. I get a great bicep and tricep workout .
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I use the arm blaster on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality product that I am very impressed with. No set up just throw over your head and start to go to work. My biceps were begging for mercy after 10 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Heitsch

customer_reviews.title: My first training with the arm blaster was awesome. I like it
customer_reviews.text: My first training with the arm blaster was awesome. I like it, i love it good job the service was werry good keep up the good work and thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for weight lifting son
customer_reviews.text: The arm blaster is a Christmas gift for my son, but he will probably be pleased with it since he is into weight lifting.
customer_reviews.author: BFergie

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: The hand grips it comes with are trash. They broke after two workouts.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: happy with this order. i feel great when i'm doing heavy lifting bicep curls to my workout routine!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This really helps you with your form and isolates your biceps

customer_reviews.title: Helps alot with biceps curls. I always swing my ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps alot with biceps curls. I always swing my arm but with the arm blaster, the entire wight is on my biceps

customer_reviews.title: Gym
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Addition to my home gym great bicep workout like no other

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I can really feel the difference in my workouts. It feels comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: High qualiy & easy to use. A good addition to arm work out routines.

customer_reviews.text: Very good item good quality and good price.. even it look nice.. i like it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Arm Blaster for my husband, he loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super product..quality...great customer service and follow up on my order

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to workout those arms
customer_reviews.text: I am 5.1 and 128lbs, my husband 6ft 210lbs .. we both use the arm Blaster perfect when working out arma using a bar ! We love it. Is padded, doesnt hurt and the velcro is so strongs and helps to adjust to the size we need. We Tottally recommend this product

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid arm blaster. I recommend that you give it a try. Legendary Workout guarantees your satisfaction.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Legendary Workout Arm Blaster - The Perfect Builder for Muscle Arms - Bomber Biceps Isolator and Triceps Curls - Weight Lifting Gym Grip Pads - Video and eBook with 20 Exercises for Bicep and Tricep
product_meta.description:
Is the rest of your body growing but you just can’t seem to get your arms to explode? 

Looking for a way to target and activate your arms in the most effective possible way? 

Look no further, we have exactly what you need! 

Introducing The Legendary Workout Arm Blaster

This quality biceps isolator will help keep your back and elbows locked in the most advantageous curling position in order to isolate and engage your arms to the max. 

With the provided palm grips, you will be able to perform every single set of your bicep curls without any pain or discomfort and the adjustable neck padding will also play a dramatic role in the overall curling experience. 

Built To Last 

The main function of this weightlifting kit is to help you build your arms’ size and strength while offering an unmatched level of comfort. 

However, we did not compromise on quality at all. In fact, this arm builder is made with top-grade aluminium materials and the neck padding is made from premium neoprene which is why you will be using your bicep blaster for a very long time! 

A Must-Have Gym Equipment

Most commercial or home gyms are not equipped with a bicep blaster such as this, which is precisely why you should get one for you and another one for your lifting partner. 

You hit the gym together, you train together, might as well perform effective bicep curls together! 

BONUS Video & e-Book To Build Massive Arms

A single piece of equipment is useless without the right information and guidance to use it. With the video and e-book included in this package, you will learn exactly what you need to do to build huge biceps and triceps with 20 different arm exercises! 

So Scroll Up, Click ‘Add To Cart’ & Finally Grow The Arms You Will Be Proud Of!
feature_bullets: ARM BLASTER: Top quality lightweight aluminum without screws for biceps and triceps curls isolator
ARMS BUILDER ISOLATOR: Sustain up to 300 lbs and comes with an adjustable comfort neck strap
WEIGHT LIFTING GRIPS: quality fitness workout glove with maximum protection & comfort for all sizes
VIDEO AND eBOOK: 20 exercises for bicep and tricep curl that allow user to build ideal muscle arms
LIFETIME GUARANTEE: If you are not 100% satisfied, we will refund the full purchase price
